Uses of Package
openthinks.libs.i18n.implement.bundle

  • Packages that use openthinks.libs.i18n.implement.bundle 
    Package Description
    openthinks.libs.i18n  
    openthinks.libs.i18n.implement.bundle  
  • Classes in openthinks.libs.i18n.implement.bundle used by openthinks.libs.i18n 
    Class and Description
    IBundleMessageType
    Used to implemented for customized IMessageType
    Need to use a combination of BundleMessageContext
    Useage:
    public enum DefaultBundleMessageType implements IBundleMessageType {
     LOG, EXCEPTION, UI;

     public String value() {
      return toString() + ":" + BASE_PACK_DIR + toString();
     }

     public String getPackName() {
      String packName = null;
      String val = value();
      if (val != null) {
       int split = val.indexOf(":");
       if (-1 != split) {
        packName = val.substring(split + 1);
       }
      }
      return packName;
     }

     public String getPackType() {
      String packType = null;
      String val = value();
      if (val != null) {
       int split = val.indexOf(":");
       if (-1 != split) {
        packType = val.substring(0, split);
       }
      }
      return packType;
     }

     public static final String BASE_PACK_DIR = "resource/i18n/";
    }
  • Classes in openthinks.libs.i18n.implement.bundle used by openthinks.libs.i18n.implement.bundle 
    Class and Description
    BundleMessage
    Bundle message hold bundle file i18n message.

    Used to implemented for customized IMessageType
    Need to use a combination of BundleMessageContext

     public static final String BASE_PACK_DIR = "resource/i18n/";
